page.title: 02WAKEFIELD INTRODUCTION
page.content: {Queen Victorias statue}has recently been restored to its original site in the{Bull Ring}right in the centre of the city.{The Ridings Shopping Centre has been completed and attracts many visitors to the area. The Wakefield area is famous for{Rugby League}with {Wakefield Trinity}being perhaps the most successful local club.{Wakefield {Prison}is a top security prison and houses many life sentenced prisoners. There are two rail stations Kirkgate and Westgate with the latter being the more important with its main line Inter-City connection to London. The bus station is near to the Bull Ring and over sixty local services run from there. These, two main libraries, an art gallery, an Elizabethan gallery, Sports centre, Prison Officer and Police Training Schools all combine to make our city --- WAKEFIELD.
